website_summaries.verdict: The ViewSonic XG2703-GS is a 27-inch monitor that uses a speedy 165Hz refresh rate and Nvidia's G-Sync technology to deliver stellar gaming performance. For the price, color accuracy could be better, and we wish there were more video ports.

customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and it has bad back light bleed. The swivel only goes clockwise which is unusual as it going both ways makes access to the connections much easier. Colourful games look great on it. Manufacturers need to improve QC. It might be time to move away from IPS and try a VA panel. Update: Just sent back my third back due to BLB and too much glow. The cost of returns is cheaper than the companies to actually do quality control before shipping them out. Until the a new panel comes along that is not a crapshoot like this AUO one that is in all current 1400p144hz IPS screens then I'm bowing out of this bullsh*t
customer_reviews.author: Bix

customer_reviews.title: got it today and it's perfect, no backlight bleed minimum glow and no dead ...
customer_reviews.text: First unit had 3 dead pixels, amazon sorted this by sending my replacement next day, got it today and it's perfect, no backlight bleed minimum glow and no dead pixels, miles better than i have seen feedback on the same model from other brands, These AHVA panels packs vivid colours, low response time, and low input lag for gaming. Can also be used with ULMB for competitive fps games and Gsync is handy if you run into lower than 144 fps. not as fast as your TN screens but with much better colours and viewing angles makes this a solid all rounder. Only 4 stars because it's so expensive
customer_reviews.author: Lun He

customer_reviews.title: Working as it should, full 165hz Adaptive Sync
customer_reviews.text: Yes, there is backlight bleeding on totally black screens but a) it is normal for an IPS which on the plus side have vivid colours and b) on my view not that important; my has quite backlight bleeding but thats it. On the plus sides are: - Very nice build quality, monitor itself looks and feels valuable - 165 Hz working great, no flickering, no noise (no feeps of condensators), no heat - I totally see no ghosting. And this for an IPS panel! Its great :) Viewsonic is an underdog in my view. Underestimated but good. Not perfect (backlight bleeding, but ok for me) so 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: cutterslade

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor to use but a couple of niggles
customer_reviews.text: This is a good monitor really quick and perfect for gaming but it is the second one I received as the first one had a dead/stuck area in the centre of the screen (thank you Amazon returns). Neither monitor came with a UK plug and the second came with a lead that didn't fit the power block, fortunately I hadn't returned the first so could continue to use the lead from that.
customer_reviews.author: Murf

customer_reviews.title: It's sooo Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: It's so pretty! Nice and bright. A huge improvement on my old monitor. Back light bleed isn't noticeable unless it cuts to a grey screen between loads - so it doesn't spoil anything important (gaming in my case). Viewing angle is very good too. Comes with usb ports built in (which wasn't mentioned in description) so you get more than specified. No problems with the monitor at all - G-sync hasn't been fully tested yet but appears to work fine on the few games i have set it up on.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a year.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor has not very noticeable backlight bleed in general, It worked pretty flawlessly when I got it, only a year later it is starting to have issues. The top right side of the screen has a grainy texture to it and there is bad image retention there as well all of a sudden. There are also times where the monitor turns off and doesn't come back on, but rarely. I thought I bought this brand new but It had a scratch on it the day I opened, so I believe It was previously used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good build, solid but has bad backlight bleed and came with a defect on the lower right of the panel.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, bad backlight bleed affecting the lower left and right and top right corners of the panel but sadly, even if that could be ignored, there's a defect on the bottom right of the panel that constantly shows a bright light through. See picture. Will try another one. Thankfully Amazons return policy protects us against these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sigh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor - Refresh rate @ 165mhz, resolution @ 2560 x 1440 & with G sync enabled. Used the setup guide for this monitor from TomsHardware to change some out of the box settings. Sharp bright clear colors with games, movies, streaming & productivity apps. A little back light bleed but its so little i have to really try hard to find it. I did buy a better DP cable than the one supplied tho to be honest not sure if it mage any difference
customer_reviews.author: Gorby

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Managed to snag this beauty for a little over £400 from Amazon Warehouse with the recent extra 20% offer. As the item was a return I was predicting a fair amount of backlight bleed. I was pleasantly surprised to find it has zero backlight bleed that I can see after my calibrated settings were installed and a low amount of IPS glow. The 1440p & G Sync is a massive upgrade from my 23" 1080p 120hz monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy everything works fine
customer_reviews.text: Very happy everything works fine. Got back light bleed in bottom left and right corners. Most of the time I can't notice while gaming but can in dark screen scenes.playing pc games at 165 Hz is fantastic. It is what it is I am very happy I got this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Trooper

customer_reviews.title: Best G-Sync Monitor for Gaming
customer_reviews.text: Before getting this one, I tried the Acer and the ASUS and was utterly disappointed by the BLB. The Viewsonic however has very little BLB and looks aesthetically pleasing! The best a gamer can get :)
customer_reviews.author: sidspacewalker

customer_reviews.title: Excessive backlight bleed
customer_reviews.text: The backlight bleed is so bad, it’s clearly visible when working and playing on PC. Bottom right corner colors are so washed out I can’t believe they would ship such a panel in an expensive monitor like this one. My old 60hz samsung IPS backlight bleed is barely visible compared to this one. Please check my image and see for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Borneus

customer_reviews.title: great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I managed to grab one of these when it was £599 (now currently £750) I really love it! i haven't spent too much time using the 165hz mode, 144hz is fantastic and i try to avoid anything "overclocky" incase i overheat it or something! awesome monitor, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Davey

customer_reviews.title: Won the lottery panel, almost.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this monitor, coming from a Dell (with its age coating) it almost feels like a glossy screen, beautiful colours. I do have very minimal Blb however, but it's only noticeable on a all black screen with lights off, which is not the kind of thing I bought it for, and not noticeable at all while gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Munkee

customer_reviews.title: and it really could come with better calibrations out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to get the luck of the draw when it comes to the panel. However, complexity of adjusting it for decent colour reproduction is difficult, and it really could come with better calibrations out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Rob and April

customer_reviews.title: Is a great gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: Is a great gaming monitor, the refresh, the colours, design...BUT! it came with big backlight bleeding, i know is an ips panel, we have expected something like this, so, becouse that and is does not boder me a lot, im gonna keep it! I recomended this beautiful monitor. And just take 4 days from dispach to my house, really fast shippin amazon and UPS !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Screen doesn't have even color temperature, half the screen is blueish on right side and yellowish on left. Bad uniformity, light leaking etc. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: edita timinskaite

customer_reviews.title: Amazing IPS G-Sync monitor.
customer_reviews.text: The best monitor I have ever owned with it's ultra crisp IPS colors and super smooth G-sync gameplay at 165Hz!. I also got lucky with my unit as it has virtually no backlight bleed. As with all IPS monitors there's a lottery element in that.
customer_reviews.author: Clancy2k

customer_reviews.title: The monitor looks actually better than on the pictures
customer_reviews.text: The monitor looks actually better than on the pictures, the green parts are barely visible. I have a bit of backlight bleeding on the top left corner but it was expected (like the AOC and the Acer using the same panel). Still, it's a shame for the price. Overall a great monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t recommend this enough.
customer_reviews.text: Magnificent. I have not tried ASUS or Acer’s 1440p monitors, but this monitor blew me away, really decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulaziz

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this. No panels issues. Great picture. Brightness and contrast arent far off. Gamma at 2.4 is best.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Parker

customer_reviews.title: minimal Back light bleed!
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived in 2 days!! that's insane!! With regards to the back light bleed, mine is minimal and just in 3 small corners. If this is the standard for viewsonic IPS screens that's much better than the predator or Rog swift I've seen!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best in class for 1440p GSync
customer_reviews.text: Really great monitor, colours and response times are perfect at 1440p
customer_reviews.author: Mr Meadows

customer_reviews.title: I had to return the first monitor i've recieved because ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the first monitor i've recieved because it had a horrendous black light bleed (ips glow). Replacement unit still had some black light bleed as every other ips monitor but it was ok. 5 stars to amazon for sending a replacement in less than a week.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning monitor! zero back light bleed or ips glow, i guess those with issues were just very unlucky! Viewsonic seem to have best QC on these panels. Gaming with this thing is bliss!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rignall

customer_reviews.title: Eh bad spot
customer_reviews.text: I got it from the warehouse with lower price. Well it also came with a dead spot on the right corner. Good but not perfect shopping
customer_reviews.author: Yutong Meng

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade going from a full HD monitor to this. Defo recommend it.

customer_reviews.text: Ghastly. Bad IPS glow on three corners. The monitor controls are on the back of the monitor. Expected more from ViewSonic. I have a DELL ultrasharp IPS and the IPS glow isnt nearly as pronounced as this one. Back to Amazon it goes. Dell from now on

product_meta.title: ViewSonic XG2703-GS 27-inch WQHD IPS Gaming Monitor with G-Sync (165Hz, 6.6ms, 1440p, HDMI, DisplayPort, 2x 2W Speakers) - Black/Green
product_meta.description:
The ViewSonic XG2703-GS is the ideal display for gamers who require ultimate performance, rendering every frame your GPU can output in breathtaking detail. Featuring an incredible 165Hz refresh rate, as well as NVIDIA’s G-Sync Technology, the XG2703-GS' variable refresh rate capabilities virtually eliminate screen tearing and stuttering for unbelievably fluid gameplay during fast-paced action sequences. Featuring cutting-edge display technology, this monitor boasts a 2560x1440 WQHD SuperClear IPS panel for enhanced colour accuracy and greater viewing angles.For a game-winning competitive edge, a Game Mode feature optimizes visuals for FPS, RTS and MOBA. On top of that, a Dark Boost function helps you target enemies lurking in the dark, while the monitor maintains brilliantly rich colors and contrast. With a gamer-inspired ergonomic stand that features an integrated headphone hook and cable management functionality, the XG2703-GS has all you need to conquer your gaming quests.

SMOOTH GAMING: NVIDIA G-SYNC technology seamlessly synchronizes the frame rate output between your graphics card and monitor. This eliminates screen tearing, minimizes stutter and input lag for the most breathtaking gameplay experience
ENHANCED VIEWING COMFORT: With Flicker-Free technology and a Blue Light Filter, this monitor helps to eliminate eyestrain that comes with extended viewing periods
GAME ON: An arsenal of pre-set customizable visual modes keeps you ready for any FPS, RTS, eSports, or MOBA games
FLEXIBLE CONNECTIVITY: The XG2703-GS supports laptops, PCs, and Macs with HDMI 1.4, USB, and Display Port inputs
BOX CONTAINS: LCD Monitor, Power Cable, DisplayPort Cable, and USB 3.0 Cable

COMFORTABLE GAMING: this monitor features a fully adjustable ergonomic stand capable of swivel, pivot, tilt, and height adjustment. An integrated headphone hook keeps them within arm’s reach, while a cable managing stand design reduces clutter around your gaming space
